title: New: Young Limbs – I Don’t Mind
content:
I don’t mind you talking to me / your eyes are pretty and your face is sweet / I don’t mind you walking my way / I like to listen to the things you say

UK outfit Young Limbs are very un-British sounding, coming across far more like the ‘cool’ bands currently emerging from Brooklyn.

Their fantastic debut track, I Don’t Mind, lands somewhere between Ariel Pink and the Beach Boys, fuzzy, slightly trippy surf-pop. Whilst it’s only their premiere outing, upon the strength of this one track, Young Limbs could well be one of the most exciting new British bands to appear this year.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
